meanings.definition: The statistical analysis of baseball data.
meanings.sent1: Sabermetrics helps teams understand baseball numbers better.
meanings.sent2: Many baseball fans enjoy learning about sabermetrics to analyze player performance.
meanings.sent3: The coach joked that he needed a sabermetrics book to decipher the players' stats.
meanings.sent4: In the world of baseball, sabermetrics is like a powerful magnifying glass for player data.
meanings.sent5: Studying sabermetrics is like unlocking a secret code to baseball statistics.

meanings.definition: The use of advanced statistics to evaluate baseball players.
meanings.sent1: Teams rely on sabermetrics to make informed decisions about players.
meanings.sent2: Sabermetrics provides a deeper insight into player performance than traditional stats.
meanings.sent3: The announcer humorously referred to sabermetrics as 'math magic' during the game.
meanings.sent4: Sabermetrics acts as a radar, pinpointing the strengths and weaknesses of players.
meanings.sent5: Exploring sabermetrics is like peering through a telescope into the world of baseball analytics.

meanings.definition: A method of evaluating baseball players using statistical analysis.
meanings.sent1: Coaches use sabermetrics to compare players based on data.
meanings.sent2: Sabermetrics offers a more objective way to assess player abilities.
meanings.sent3: The team owner playfully called sabermetrics the 'magic crystal ball' of baseball.
meanings.sent4: Sabermetrics acts as a compass, guiding teams towards optimal player selections.
meanings.sent5: Delving into sabermetrics is like embarking on a treasure hunt for player insights.
